title: High-energy Coulomb scattering of spatially extended particles
abstract:
We analyze pure Coulomb high-energy elastic scattering of charged particles
(hadrons or nuclei), discarding their strong interactions. We distinguish three
scattering modes, determined by the magnitude of the momentum transfer, in
which particles behave as point-like, structureless extended, and structured
composite objects. The results are compared in the potential and QFT approaches
of the eikonal model.
